title: Indonesia - Sri Lanka Preferential Trade Agreement (ISLPTA)
decision_details: - Approval of the Cabinet has been granted at the meeting held on 2023‑07‑10 to initiate negotiations on a Preferential Trade Agreement with Indonesia. Official discussions related thereto have been conducted on 2024‑03‑14 between the State Minister of Foreign Affairs and the Deputy Minister of Trade in Indonesia and the First Meeting of the Trade Negotiation Committee has been held on 3rd and 4th April 2024, via online. At the said Negotiation Committee,views have been exchanged between the two parties regarding the modality of the negotiations, time frame for the exchange of relevant data, scope and coverage. The two parties have agreed to hold the 2nd meeting of the said Committee on 19th and 20th of June 2024 in Colombo. Accordingly, the Cabinet considered the facts submitted by the Hon. President on the progress so far achieved from the proposed Preferential Trade Agreement as referred to at above.
